question.text: Bright Sky Café owner, Marta Padilla has signed a lease for a second restaurant at 422 Oak Street. The building, adjacent to Cade Theater, formerly housed a branch of Haldon Bank. Ms. Padilla's new venture, to be called Tierra Bistro, will start service on June 5. At first, however, the bistro will be open only during the evening hours. The idea is to attract a following, especially among theatergoers, before adding a lunch service. Ms. Padilla’s successful original eatery. Bright Sky Cafe, is situated on Second Street, close to the Wynn Farmers' Market bus stop. Executive Chef Armando Lucca will oversee both locations.
What is the purpose of the article?
choices: (A) To profile a successful property sales agent
(B) To discuss the opening of a new business
(C) To report on a restaurant's relocation
(D) To announce a change in ownership

answer.text: (B) To discuss the opening of a new business
answer.explanation: The information can be inferred from: "Bright Sky Café owner, Marta Padilla has signed a lease for a second restaurant at 422 Oak Street."

question.text: What is indicated about Tierra Bistro?
choices: (A) It is scheduled to begin serving lunch on June 5,
(B) It is located near a public transportation route.
(C) It is Ms. Padilla’s first restaurant.
(D) It is expected to receive business from theater patrons.

answer.text: (D) It is expected to receive business from theater patrons.
answer.explanation: The information is in: "The idea is to attract a following, especially among theatergoers, before adding a lunch service. Ms. Padilla’s successful original eatery."

question.text:
To: Garston Architects Ltd. Staff
From: Archie Wentworth, Senior Partner
Re： All-staff meeting
Date： 20 March

To All Staff,
Next Monday, 27 March，we will have a special guest at our all-staff meeting in room 203. Vera Pavlovich is a senior architect at the Norgaard-Holm Firm in Copenhagen, where she has worked for the past four years. She led the design of Copenhagen’s Lund House as well as the Iversen Building in Stockholm. Both buildings have won international awards for their sleek, innovative designs. Before making a name for herself in Europe，Ms. Pavlovich spent eight years in New York City at the Ellison-Grant Architect Group. It was at Ellison-Grant that I had the chance to collaborate with her on several projects. Ms. Pavlovich will be here in Edinburgh next week and has agreed to give a talk at our meeting about several of her internationally acclaimed design projects. All staff are urged to attend.
What does the memo discuss?
choices: (A) Plans to open a branch office
(B) The hiring of a new staff member

answer.explanation: You can inferred from: "Vera Pavlovich is a senior architect at the Norgaard-Holm Firm in Copenhagen, where she has worked for the past four years. She led the design of Copenhagen’s Lund House as well as the Iversen Building in Stockholm."

question.text: What does Mr. Wentworth indicate about Ms. Pavlovich?
choices: (A) She will do design work for one of his firm’s projects.
(B) She plans to open her own firm.
(C) She is a former colleague of his.
(D) She is in the process of moving to a new city.

answer.text: (C) She is a former colleague of his.
answer.explanation: The information can be inferred from: "It was at Ellison-Grant that I had the chance to collaborate with her on several projects."

question.text: Where is Garston Architects Ltd. located?

answer.explanation: The informationMs. Pavlovich will be here in Edinburgh next week and has agreed to give a talk at our meeting about several of her internationally acclaimed design projects.

question.text:
Calmont Art Museum

254 Tanner Road

Hamilton HM 12

www.calmont.org.Hm


19 December
Mr. Reggie Sayre
16 Neville Lane
Paget PG 05
Bermuda

Dear Mr. Sayre,
As a Calmont Art Museum member, you will soon be able to take advantage of our Member Appreciation Month discounts. - [1] - From 1 to 31 January, members will receive an extra 20 percent savings on all gift-shop items. Members will also be offered a complimentary cup of coffee or tea with their meal in the cafe. Additionally, those who become first-time members by 31 January will receive a 10 percent membership fee discount. - [2] - , So encourage your friends to go online and sign up.
- [3] - Every Friday of the month, the previously closed third-floor galleries, which feature sculptures and paintings by contemporary Bermudian artists, will be open to all visitors until 9:00 P.M. Photographs of select artwork from these galleries can be viewed on our Web site.
- [4] -. We hope to see you in the coming month.

Sincerely,
Ilyana Cooper
Director of Member Services
What is true about the Calmont Art Museum building?
choices: (B) It will be closing for one month.
(C) It will have photographs on display.
(D) It has a studio for art classes.

answer.explanation: The information can be inferred from: "Members will also be offered a complimentary cup of coffee or tea with their meal in the cafe."

question.text: According to the letter, what will be different on Fridays?
choices: (C) Hours at the gift shop will be extended.
(D) Bermudian artwork will be on sale.

answer.explanation: The information is in: "Every Friday of the month, the previously closed third-floor galleries, which feature sculptures and paintings by contemporary Bermudian artists, will be open to all visitors until 9:00 P.M. Photographs of select artwork from these galleries can be viewed on our Web site."

question.text:
In which of the positions marked [1], [2], [3], and [4] does the following sentence best belong?
“January is a wonderful time to visit the museum for another reason.”

answer.explanation: The sentence after position [3] mentions about the additional galleries.

question.text:
To: Moana Dixon mdixon@jeminaoys.com.au
From: So-Huyn Ahn sahn@jeminatoys.co.kr
Subject: Jemina Toy’s anniversary
Date: 20 June
Attachment: Kickoff celebration

Dear Vice President Dixon,
Several high-profile events and mix of advertisements are now in place for Jemina Toy’s celebration of fifty years in Korea. The kickoff banquet will be held at the Grand Harper Hotel in Seoul on 2 August. We’re eager to hear your decision about whether you will join us as our guest of honour. You’ll find an invitation attached.
We just arranged advertising for a series of in-store anniversary sales that will launch periodically over the remainder of the year. We’ll also be sending out press releases before each of these. I’ll provide you with a complete schedule once it is finalized.

Sincerely,
So-Hyun Ahn
Korea Marketing Director, Jemina Toys
What is the purpose of the e-mail?
choices: (C) To agree to attend a dinner

answer.explanation: The information is in: "Several high-profile events and mix of advertisements are now in place for Jemina Toy’s celebration of fifty years in Korea."

question.text: What does Ms. Ahn promise to send later?

answer.explanation: The information can be inferred from: "We just arranged advertising for a series of in-store anniversary sales that will launch periodically over the remainder of the year. We’ll also be sending out press releases before each of these. I’ll provide you with a complete schedule once it is finalized."

question.text:
Long Ride Even Longer?

By Selma Gonzalez
On Monday, Chien Motors, the manufacturer now producing Long motorcycles, announced a delay in the the introduction of the new Flash JX model. Industry competitors responded with surprise at the news. -[l]-. And Long Ride motorcycle fans went online en masse to express frustration with Chien Motors for canceling March s much-anticipated roll- out.
It seems the decision to equip the Flash JX with a hybrid system, which uses both gasoline and electric power, is to blame. Chien Motors admits that the prototype was rejected because of its excessive size and weight. This design of the power system would have required a larger motorcycle body than planned. They also had concerns over its lack of power output.-[2]- .
In addition to the design challenges, the Long Ride factory, having been equipped to produce previous models, is not ready for production of the Flash JX hybrid -[3]- . New equipment will need to be purchased, and the assembly floor will need to be reconfigured.
Last year, Chien Motors was widely praised by motorcycle enthusiasts after it stepped in to save Long Ride from going out of business. What a difference twelve months has made .-[4]- .
What is indicated about Chien Motors?
choices: (A) It owns the Long Ride motorcycle brand.
(B) It plans to sell a model at a reduced price.
(D) It will introduce a new motorcycle in March.

answer.text: (A) It owns the Long Ride motorcycle brand.
answer.explanation: The information can be inferred from: "On Monday, Chien Motors, the manufacturer now producing Long motorcycles, announced a delay in the the introduction of the new Flash JX model. "

question.text: What is NOT mentioned as a problem with the power system?

answer.explanation: The information can be inferred from: "Motors admits that the prototype was rejected because of its excessive size and weight...They also had concerns over its lack of power output."

question.text: Why will the factory be renovated?
choices: (A) It does not comply with a new regulation.
(B) It has not been updated in over a decade.
(C) It had been set up to make older models,
(D) It is too small to produce two models at once.

answer.text: (C) It had been set up to make older models,
answer.explanation: You can inferred the information from: "In addition to the design challenges, the Long Ride factory, having been equipped to produce previous models, is not ready for production of the Flash JX hybrid "

question.text:
In which of the positions marked [1], [2], [3], and [4] does the following sentence best belong?
“Now they will need to win back the goodwill of these potential customers."

answer.explanation: Because the sentence before position [4] mention about that Chien Motors saved Long Ride from going out of business.

question.text:
Nimblearn

Find the Information Your Company Needs

Nimblearn is a robust, next-generation tool designed to make creating surveys easy, effective, and affordable. Our intuitive Web-based software allows you to design and administer surveys and automatically track and analyze results.

You asked for it, we created it. We designed Nimblearn to include all the features you requested:

• A simple process for designing surveys that guides you every step of the way
• A huge list of question types, from true/false to open text, with advice on how and when to use each one
• A library of proven sample questions designed to gather essential feedback on quality
• Loads of quick and easy ways to distribute your surveys (e-mail, social)

Go to www.nimblearn.com to learn more.
How would a company most likely use Nimblearn?

answer.explanation: The information is in: "Nimblearn is a robust, next-generation tool designed to make creating surveys easy, effective, and affordable. Our intuitive Web-based software allows you to design and administer surveys and automatically track and analyze results."

(B) It posts customer reviews on its Web site.
(C) It has a reputation for producing high-quality goods.
(D) It used customer feedback in developing the product.

answer.text: (D) It used customer feedback in developing the product.

(B) - A library of proven sample questions designed to gather essential feedback on quality

question.text:
Prendis National Park Authority (PNPA)

Prendis National Park includes mainland shore areas and Prendis Island itself. Please note, however, that additional restrictions will be in force for accessing the island this summer. Unless they are members of an official tour, visitor visitors to the Park will be prohibited from setting foot on Prendis Island. This rule also applies to individuals who may wish to visit the island independently using private watercraft. Such individuals may review the island from the water and may anchor offshore, but must not make landfall on the island.

The PNPA’s official boat tours for visitors to the island are offered seven days a week throughout the year and depart at two hour time intervals starting at 8 A.M. The final tour leaves at 4 P.M, except for the summer months of December through March, when this is extended to 6 P.M. Call 08 9776 5992 to make reservations. The official tour includes a brief visit to the island itself, where you can view bird-nesting areas with a PNPA park ranger as your authorized escort.

Payment and Reservations
• Tours are capped at 18 participants. If your group is smaller than 15, we reserve the right to include other visitors in your tour,
• Tickets are $20 per person for those 12 years of age and over and $10 per child under the age of 12.
• A nonrefundable deposit of $5 per person is required to hold a reservation for groups. Your deposit will be credited to your total group admission fee. If your party does not arrive at the specified time, we reserve the right to shorten the trip as necessary in order to avoid interfering with subsequent tours. Rescheduling cannot be considered.
What is announced in the notice?

answer.explanation: The information can be inferred from: "Please note, however, that additional restrictions will be in force for accessing the island this summer."

question.text: What is indicated about visiting Prendis Island?
choices: (A) Visitors are warned not to disturb the wildlife.
(B) To tour on foot, visitors must be accompanied by a guide.
(C) Visitors are not permitted to swim near the island.
(D) To view the island from a boat, visitors must join an official tour.

answer.text: (B) To tour on foot, visitors must be accompanied by a guide.
answer.explanation: The information is in: "Unless they are members of an official tour, visitor visitors to the Park will be prohibited from setting foot on Prendis Island."

question.text: What is NOT mentioned about the PNPA's tours?

answer.explanation:
(A) - Tours are capped at 18 participants. If your group is smaller than 15, we reserve the right to include other visitors in your tour,
(B) - A nonrefundable deposit of $5 per person is required to hold a reservation for groups.
(C) - The final tour leaves at 4 P.M, except for the summer months of December through March, when this is extended to 6 P.M.

question.text: According to the notice, what may happen if a group arrives late for a scheduled tour?
choices: (B) It may last less than two hours.
(D) It may be moved to another day‘

answer.text: (B) It may last less than two hours.
answer.explanation: The information can be inferred from: "If your party does not arrive at the specified time, we reserve the right to shorten the trip as necessary in order to avoid interfering with subsequent tours. Rescheduling cannot be considered."

TriStar Sports Gear

5477 Fairmont Avenue

Bemidji, MN 56634

218-555-3412

www.tristarsportsgear.com

Summer sale from July 1 to July 14


The school year has ended and summer has arrived, stop by Tristar Sports Gear and take advantage of our huge annual summer sale beginning this Friday. Now is the time to get ready for summer fun. We will be selling jerseys from your favorite sports teams for 20% off the original price. Also, if you buy two pairs of athletic shoes, you can get the third pair at half price. There is much more on sale, so please see the sale list on the back page.

* Bring this flyer to our store and you can get a 10% discount on all kinds of balls.
